item.title: Mode Control Panel Selectors – Selector Push Functions – IAS/MACH (Push Button)

note.para: Rotational function of these selectors must be operative.

numlitem.para: If VNAV operation is desired, speed entries can be made via the FMC CDU.

note.para: With the IAS/MACH push function inoperative, VNAV speed intervention can not be invoked. Non-precision approaches using VNAV are not to be conducted.

placard.para: Placard IAS/MACH switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
